thread.section_title: The Paper Factory Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Long Island City, New York) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Director
thread.title_full: Director - Review of The Paper Factory Hotel, Long Island City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Mark B
title: Director
text: I was on a trip to New York City where I stayed at the paper factory hotel. It was my first visit there and I was extremely tired. As I entered into the building I was immediately greeted, by A well professionally dressed young lady, by the name of Natasha. She made me feel very welcome after a long tiring trip from across the country. She made sure that I was properly welcomed and informed about the features of the hotel. She gave excellent customer service in which I am grateful. I say to the management, Promote her as soon as possible. We need more professional customer service representatives in the hospitality field. She made my first time visit to the hotel, extremely inviting and welcomed.
